thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Dabeinong Technology's Unit Plans To Invest 440.5 Mln Yuan In Hog Breeding Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Dabeinong Technology's Unit Plans To Invest 440.5 Mln Yuan In Hog Breeding Project

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing dabeinong technology group co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO INVEST 440.5 MILLION YUAN ($69.98 million) IN HOG BREEDING PROJECT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nvXN12 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2945 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
